By using the Crystal Release: Jade Crystal Mirror as a medium, Guren creates six clones of herself that emerge from the mirror. Due to them being made of crystal, those said clones can endure further damage than that of a shadow clone can. These clones are also able to deceive [[Byakugan]] users due to their reflective nature, but by focusing their sight, this can be circumvented.

[[es:Jutsu: Clon de Cristal de Jade]]
[[pt-br:Técnica do Clone Cristal de Jade]]
[[pl:Suishō Bunshin no Jutsu]]
